Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.style

Class Stroke

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.style.Stroke
public class Stroke extends Object
Wrapper that adds additional functionality and interoperation to Stroke. Strokes can be added to Styles that are used by Drawables to draw on a DrawingSurface.

Construction

A stroke can be constructed with stroke(), and then attributes can be added using the with*() functional methods. Once created, the stroke can be applied to a Graphics2D drawing surface with apply(Graphics2D). Java2dDrawingSurface will apply strokes automatically based on drawing Styles.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
